home_def: Let strawberries grown with love and care decorate your table!
about_us_def1: Our enterprise was the first in Turkmenistan to grow strawberries in an industrially large greenhouse equipped with the latest technologies. The production process of the greenhouse, where environmentally friendly, vitaminized, tasty strawberries are grown, is carried out by experienced specialists. The work of the greenhouse complex is carried out purposefully, which makes it possible to provide the population with high-quality agricultural products in all seasons of the year, making a worthy contribution to the ensuring of food abundance in the country's markets.
about_us_def2: Strawberries are not just a tasty berry, they are also beneficial for human health. We strive to satisfy people's demand for this healthy berry and allow them to enjoy the taste of strawberries at any time of the year.
def: Our greenhouse is equipped with equipment that meets international standards
address: Ashgabat city, Yylgay Durdyev St., Saher building, 3rd floor
footer_txt: Share Happiness, Enjoyment and Health with Strawberries
recipes_txt: Confectionery, cocktails, milkshakes, salads, jam, etc.
collective_slogan: Interdependent people combine their efforts with the efforts of others to achieve maximum success
catalog_header_txt: Catalog of strawberries packed in various containers
form_head: To make your wish come true!
name: Your name
bouquets_txt: The dark and creamy chocolate clashes well with sweet and tangy strawberries
